entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Freezing App when Navigating Between Tabs with BlazorWebView in Maui Blazor App #22344
  • MudBlazor Dialog does not works in Maui Blazor. #22343
  • [windows] Processing Resources failed with error: Duplicate Entry #22342

Closed

  • ListView duplicate first item #10582
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.1.7762] [WinUI] An exception is thrown after removing an item from its close button #16324
  • navHost cannot be null after app2app #15788

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix frame ping #22347
  • [Windows] Improve performance of `ContentPanel.EnsureBorderPath` #22346
    platform/windows 🪟, area-perf, community ✨
  • [Android] InputTransparent="true" on a Layout breaks child controls - Fix #22345
    community ✨

Merged

  • Flakey test fixes #22338
    area-testing
  • Update Versions.props #22341
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr5] Flakey test fixes #22340
    area-testing

Updated

  • Add unit test for button images in layouts #21651
    area-testing, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Install bits for UITest to run #22333
    area-testing
  • Add Frame observer for UIWindow frame changes #20237
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-frame
  • Fix Windows device tests #20401
    area-testing
  • [Android] ImageButton Border does not fit to CornerRadius - fix #21259
    legacy-area-controls, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area-layout, legacy-area-controls, community ✨
  • [iOS] BoxView auto scaling not working when layout changes #21955
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, legacy-area-controls, community ✨
  • [Controls] Enforce CA1507 - use nameof() where possible #22102
    area-architecture, community ✨
  • Facing issues with the Entry, DatePicker, and CheckBox components when applying themes - Fix #21826
    legacy-area-controls, community ✨, area-theme
  • [Android] Support for images inside HTML label #21679
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Enforce CA1854 performance analyzer #22100
    area-architecture, community ✨
  • Reuse/share the Button RippleDrawable logic with ImageButton #22298
    platform/android 🤖, legacy-area-controls, area-controls-button
  • [Trimming] Add ILC compilation test of all assemblies #22328
    area-publishing
  • Fixes KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when using scrollable Editor #21932
    community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, legacy-area-controls, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leaks in `*Cell` #22067
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-listview, memory-leak 💦
  • Bump to 8.0.60 #22339
    area-infrastructure
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area-infrastructure, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #22213
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures
